message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn to decide!
I think a more even split is fair, considering the money will lose value in the next rounds. Let's split it 55/45. What do you think?
I'm not sure 45 is enough for me. I'll need a bit more to make it worth my while.
Let's meet in the middle and make it a 50/50 split. No more negotiating, just a fair split.
